issue.title: [CF 1466] Missing Resource - Soul Fragments
issue.body:
DH Soul Cleave & Spirit Bomb are best optimized by monitoring their resource Soul Fragments, just like Rogue abilities and Combo Points.

Please add Soul Fragments to your Resource listing.

 

Thank you for all you do!

Tool is much easier to use and much less buggie/issue prone than WeakAuras.


> Posted by CurseForge user gr71cj5 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1466 | Raw

comments.body:
If you're trying to use notifications, then Soul Fragments are listed under spell charges instead of resources. If you're just trying to use the normal icon settings, there's a "stack" option that works in terms of making the icon appear at a certain number of stacks. 

For me, the problem I'm running into is that the notifications don't work for Soul Fragments when using "greater than" or "greater than equal too" under "While Condition Set Passing." Oddly, it does work the other way around. Perhaps Soul Fragments have the wrong id number? 


> Posted by CurseForge user nishu27

Soul fragments aren't a resource, they're just a buff. Track the stacks of the "Soul Fragments" buff.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
